channel.title: Desktop forum loading issue, err 500 - Ahorita regreso
channel.description:
> [color=red]*For better/faster support, try Discord: https://discord.gg/tol[/color]
What happened: Error message appears on laptop ![unknown|690x387](upload://3bPohvpJlnU1eZ3Ehu7aufCHzYG.png)
What was SUPPOSED to happen: Error message not appear and access site normally
Steps to reproduce this issue:
1. Get laptop 2. Type forum.Imperium42.com 3. Press enter

item.title: Desktop forum loading issue, err 500 - Ahorita regreso
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
No, I am using the forums on mobile
Forums worked normally in my two other PCs in Opera. Main difference between them and this one are that this one is a laptop, it is in Spanish, it is not a licensed Windows copy and the bandwidth is very slow (which I think to be the problem).
I will run MBAM and unistall McAfee in a bit (computer is not mines but kek)

Read full topic

item.title: Desktop forum loading issue, err 500 - Ahorita regreso
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
¿But you are here now without errors? I’m a bit confused~

Also, Opera is not a very supported browser – try Chrome/Firefox.

+Error 500 is a “refused” connection, often caused by extensions, firewall, or popup blockers.

Read full topic
